verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
They’re underneath
the Blood,
On the Cross of Calvary,
As far removed as darkness
is from dawn;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
In the sea
of God’s forgetfulness,
that’s good enough for me,
Praise God,
my sins are gone.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
And when I meet
the scoffers
who asks me where they are,
I say,
my sins are gone.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
‘Twas at the old time altar
where God came in my heart
And now,
my sins are gone;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
The Lord
took full possession,
the devil did depart,
I’m glad
my sins are gone.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
When Satan comes
to tempt me
and tries to make me doubt,
I say,
my sins are gone;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
You got me into trouble, but Jesus got me out,
I’m glad
my sins are gone.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
My soul is filled with music, with all my heart
I say,
I know
my sins are gone.
